Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.name: libraryNotInitialized
Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.abstract: You must call the initialize fuction before using the library.

Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.name: refreshReceiptFailed
Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.abstract: Failed to refresh the App Store receipt.

Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.name: validateReceiptFailed
Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.abstract: Failed to validate the App Store receipt with Fovea.

Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.name: refreshProductsFailed
Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.abstract: Failed to refresh products from the App Store.

Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.name: productNotFound
Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.abstract: The product was not found on the App Store and cannot be purchased.

Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.name: cannotMakePurchase
Enums/IAPErrorCode.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.abstract: The user is not allowed to authorize payments.

Enums/IAPRefreshResultState.html#/s:16In.name: skipped
Enums/IAPRefreshResultState.html#/s:16In.abstract: Refresh has been skipped because it is not necessary.

Enums/IAPPurchaseResultState.html#/s:16I.name: cancelled
Enums/IAPPurchaseResultState.html#/s:16I.abstract: The purchase was cancelled by the user.

Structs/IAPRefreshResult.html#/s:16InApp.name: iapError
Structs/IAPRefreshResult.html#/s:16InApp.abstract: If the state is failed, the result can return an IAPError.

Structs/IAPRefreshResult.html#/s:16InApp.name: addedPurchases
Structs/IAPRefreshResult.html#/s:16InApp.abstract: If the state is succeeded, returns the number of purchases that have been added.

Structs/IAPRefreshResult.html#/s:16InApp.name: updatedPurchases
Structs/IAPRefreshResult.html#/s:16InApp.abstract: If the state is succeeded, returns the number of purchases that have been updated.

Structs/IAPPurchaseResult.html#/s:16InAp.name: iapError
Structs/IAPPurchaseResult.html#/s:16InAp.abstract: If the state is failed, the result can return an IAPError.

Structs/IAPPurchaseResult.html#/s:16InAp.name: skError
Structs/IAPPurchaseResult.html#/s:16InAp.abstract: If the state is failed, the result can return an SKError.

Structs/IAPPurchaseResult.html#/s:16InAp.name: localizedDescription
Structs/IAPPurchaseResult.html#/s:16InAp.abstract: If there is an error, return the localized description.

Enums/IAPPeriodFormat.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: short
Enums/IAPPeriodFormat.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Remove the number of units if it is equal to 1.

Enums/IAPPeriodFormat.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: long
Enums/IAPPeriodFormat.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: The period will be returned with the number and the unit.

Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.name: localizedPeriodFormat
Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.abstract: The format used for the localized subscription periods.

Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.name: hasIntroductoryPriceEligible()
Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.abstract: Checks if the product has an introductory price the user is eligible to.

Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.name: localizedPrice
Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.abstract: Returns a localized string with the cost of the product in the local currency.

Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.name: localizedSubscriptionPeriod
Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.abstract: Returns a localized string with the period of the subscription product.

Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.name: localizedIntroductoryPrice
Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.abstract: Returns a localized string with the introductory price if available, in the local currency.

Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.name: localizedIntroductoryPeriod
Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.abstract: Returns a localized string with the introductory price period of the subscription product.

Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.name: localizedIntroductoryDuration
Extensions/SKProduct.html#/s:So9SKProduc.abstract: Returns a localized string with the duration of the introductory price.

Enums/IAPProductType.html#/s:16InAppPurc.name: consumable
Enums/IAPProductType.html#/s:16InAppPurc.abstract: Consumable in-app purchases are used once, are depleted, and can be purchased again.

Enums/IAPProductType.html#/s:16InAppPurc.name: nonConsumable
Enums/IAPProductType.html#/s:16InAppPurc.abstract: Non-consumables are purchased once and do not expire.

Enums/IAPProductType.html#/s:16InAppPurc.name: nonRenewingSubscription
Enums/IAPProductType.html#/s:16InAppPurc.abstract: This type of subscription does not renew automatically, so users need to renew each time.

Enums/IAPProductType.html#/s:16InAppPurc.name: autoRenewableSubscription
Enums/IAPProductType.html#/s:16InAppPurc.abstract: Users are charged on a recurring basis until they decide to cancel.

Structs/IAPProduct.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.name: init(productIdentifier:productType:)
Structs/IAPProduct.html#/s:16InAppPurcha.abstract: Initializes an IAPProduct with its identifier and type.

Protocols/IAPPurchaseDelegate.html#/s:16.name: productPurchased(productIdentifier:)
Protocols/IAPPurchaseDelegate.html#/s:16.abstract: Called when a product is newly purchased, updated or restored.

Classes/DefaultPurchaseDelegate.html#/s:.name: productPurchased(productIdentifier:)
Classes/DefaultPurchaseDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Finish the product transactions when a product is newly purchased, updated or restored.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: iapPurchaseDelegate
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: The instance of class that adopts the IAPPurchaseDelegate protocol.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: applicationUsername
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: The user name, if your app implements user login.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: initialize(iapProducts:validatorUrlString:iapPurchaseDelegate:applicationUsername:)
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Start observing the payment queue, as soon as possible, and refresh Product list and user Receipt.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: stop()
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Stop observing the payment queue, when the application will terminate, for proper cleanup.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: getProducts()
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Gets all products retrieved from the App Store

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: getProductBy(identifier:)
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Gets the product by its identifier from the list of products retrieved from the App Store.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: canMakePayments()
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Checks if the user is allowed to authorize payments.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: purchase(productIdentifier:quantity:callback:)
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Request a Payment from the App Store.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: hasDeferredTransaction(for:)
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Checks if the last transaction state for a given product was deferred.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: hasAlreadyPurchased()
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Checks if the user has already purchased at least one product.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: hasActivePurchase(for:)
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Checks if the user currently own (or is subscribed to) a given product (nonConsumable or autoRenewableSubscription).

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: hasActiveSubscription()
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Checks if the user has an active auto renewable subscription regardless of the product identifier.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: getPurchaseDate(for:)
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Returns the latest purchased date for a given product.

Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.name: getExpiryDate(for:)
Protocols/InAppPurchaseLib.html#/s:16InA.abstract: Returns the expiry date for a subcription. May be past or future.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: iapPurchaseDelegate
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: The instance of class that adopts the IAPPurchaseDelegate protocol.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: applicationUsername
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: The user name, if your app implements user login.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: initialize(iapProducts:validatorUrlString:iapPurchaseDelegate:applicationUsername:)
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Start observing the payment queue, as soon as possible, and refresh Product list and user Receipt.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: stop()
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Stop observing the payment queue, when the application will terminate, for proper cleanup.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: getProducts()
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Gets all products retrieved from the App Store

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: getProductBy(identifier:)
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Gets the product by its identifier from the list of products retrieved from the App Store.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: canMakePayments()
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Checks if the user is allowed to authorize payments.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: purchase(productIdentifier:quantity:callback:)
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Request a Payment from the App Store.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: hasDeferredTransaction(for:)
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Checks if the last transaction state for a given product was deferred.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: hasAlreadyPurchased()
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Checks if the user has already purchased at least one product.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: hasActivePurchase(for:)
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Checks if the user currently own (or is subscribed to) a given product (nonConsumable or autoRenewableSubscription).

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: hasActiveSubscription()
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Checks if the user has an active auto renewable subscription regardless of the product identifier.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: getPurchaseDate(for:)
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Returns the latest purchased date for a given product.

Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.name: getExpiryDate(for:)
Classes/InAppPurchase.html#/s:16InAppPur.abstract: Returns the expiry date for a subcription. May be past or future.

Classes/DefaultPurchaseDelegate.html.name: DefaultPurchaseDelegate
Classes/DefaultPurchaseDelegate.html.abstract: The default implementation of IAPPurchaseDelegate if no other is provided. It is enough if you only have non-consumable and/or auto-renewable subscription products.

Protocols/IAPPurchaseDelegate.html.name: IAPPurchaseDelegate
Protocols/IAPPurchaseDelegate.html.abstract: The protocol that you must adopt if you have consumable and/or non-renewing subscription products.

Enums/IAPPeriodFormat.html.name: IAPPeriodFormat
Enums/IAPPeriodFormat.html.abstract: The format used for the localized subscription periods.

Structs/IAPRefreshResult.html.name: IAPRefreshResult
Structs/IAPRefreshResult.html.abstract: The result returned in the refresh() or restorePurchases() callback.

Enums/IAPPurchaseResultState.html.name: IAPPurchaseResultState
Enums/IAPPurchaseResultState.html.abstract: The list of the different states of the IAPPurchaseResult.

Enums/IAPRefreshResultState.html.name: IAPRefreshResultState
Enums/IAPRefreshResultState.html.abstract: The list of the different states of the IAPRefreshResult.

Structs/IAPError.html.name: IAPError
Structs/IAPError.html.abstract: When calling refresh(), purchase() or restorePurchases(), the callback can return an IAPError if the state is failed.

Enums/IAPErrorCode.html.name: IAPErrorCode
Enums/IAPErrorCode.html.abstract: The list of error codes that can be returned by the library.
